The history of the creation as it is written by Moses in the first and second chapters of Genesis : plainly opened and expounded in severall sermons preached in London : whereunto is added a short treatise of Gods actuall Providence in ruling, ordering, and governing the world and all things therein / by G.W. Walker, George, 1581?-1651.
[4], 16, 295 p.
Printed for John Barlet, London : 1641.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
